title: Information Flow Rate for Cross-Correlated Stochastic Processes. (arXiv:2401.04950v1 [physics.data-an])
abstract: Causal inference seeks to identify cause-and-effect interactions in coupled systems. A recently proposed method by Liang detects causal relations by quantifying the direction and magnitude of information flow between time series. The theoretical formulation of information flow for stochastic dynamical systems provides a general expression and a data-driven statistic for the rate of entropy transfer between different system units. To advance understanding of information flow rate in terms of intuitive concepts and physically meaningful parameters, we investigate statistical properties of the data-driven information flow rate between coupled stochastic processes. We derive relations between the expectation of the information flow rate statistic and properties of the auto- and cross-correlation functions. translated_title: 跨相关随机过程的信息流速率
translated_abstract: 因果推断旨在识别耦合系统中的因果关系。Liang最近提出的一种方法通过量化时间序列之间的信息流的方向和大小来检测因果关系。随机动力系统的信息流的理论表述提供了一个总体表达式和一个数据驱动的统计量，用于衡量不同系统单元之间的熵传输速率。为了推进对信息流速率的理解，以直观概念和物理上有意义的参数为基础，我们研究了耦合随机过程之间的数据驱动信息流速率的统计特性。我们推导出了信息流速率统计量的期望与自相关和互相关函数的属性之间的关系。因此，我们阐明了信息流速率对相关函数的分析性质和特征时间的依赖性。我们的分析提供了对信息流与耦合随机过程之间关系的洞察。
tldr: 该论文探讨了耦合随机过程中基于数据驱动的信息流速率的统计特性，通过推导信息流速率统计量与自相关和互相关函数属性之间的关系，揭示了信息流速率与相关函数特征的依赖性。
en_tdlr: This paper investigates the statistical properties of data-driven information flow rate between coupled stochastic processes. By deriving the relations between the information flow rate statistic and the properties of auto- and cross-correlation functions, the dependence of information flow rate on the characteristics of correlation functions is elucidated.
